definition: to participate (in sth)/to play a humble role in
body/life/oneself/personally/one's morality and conduct/the main part of a structure or body/pregnant/classifier for sets of clothes: suit, twinset/Kangxi radical 158

sentences.english: In fact, he found it impossible to participate in American public life.
sentences.chinese: 但他發現他不能廁身美國政壇。
